1.title: Mastermind I: CLI
1.description: A command line version of the classic Mastermind code breaking game using Node JS.

2.title: Mastermind II: GUI
2.description: Mastermind with an all new GUI using React.

3.title: Mastermind III: API
3.description: Build your own version of the Mastermind Game using my API!

4.title: Mastermind IV: Evolved
4.description: Create an account, store your game history and compare your skills against our leaderboard. Game built using Node + React + GraphQL.

5.title: Mastermind V: Mobile
5.description: Take Mastermind wherever you go on your Android or iPhone! Game builds on Evolved with React Native.

6.title: Mastermind VI: Battlefield
6.description: Compete against your friends online in real-time and see if you are truly the best code-breaker.
